DamageImmunities: Poison, Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Natural Camouflage
Traits.Content: While in dim light or darkness, the Annelid has advantage on Stealth checks.

Traits.Name: Parasitic Aura
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the Annelid takes 1 necrotic damage.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Constrict
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is Medium or smaller. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the Annelid can’t constrict another target.
